summary: Frontend testing for ImportDocumenti page unification (P1 task). All features working correctly: tabs switching, redirects, document type selection, drop zone functionality.
critical_code_review_comments: ImportDocumenti.jsx is well-structured with clear separation between ImportMassivoTab and AIParserTab components
Good use of data-testid attributes for testing (drop-zone, tipo-*, file-input, etc.)
Tab switching via useSearchParams works correctly with ?tab=ai parameter
context_for_next_testing_agent: ImportDocumenti page unification complete. All tests passed: (1) /import-documenti loads with Import Massivo tab active, (2) Lettura AI tab switches correctly, (3) /ai-parser redirects to /import-documenti?tab=ai, (4) /import-unificato renders ImportDocumenti component (not a redirect but same component), (5) Menu shows 'Import Documenti' under Strumenti, (6) Document type selection works (13 types available), (7) Drop zone visible and functional.

redirect_ai_parser.details: Redirect works correctly, Lettura AI tab is active

redirect_import_unificato.details: Route renders ImportDocumenti component directly (not a redirect)

url_tab_parameter.details: Tab parameter correctly activates Lettura AI tab
